channel.title: INtech
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from INtech, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: 8 Best Water Leak Detectors (2025), Tested and Reviewed
item.description: Don’t let busted pipes or an overflowing washing machine dampen your day. These WIRED-tested smart water sensors can help you catch problems quicker.

item.title: The Recruitment Effort That Helped Build Elon Musk’s DOGE Army

item.title: Ex-Meta employee sues for sexual harassment
item.description: Welcome back to Week in Review. This week we’re diving into Google quietly removing its pledge to not build AI weapons for surveillance; how Elon Musk...

item.title: Elon Musk said he’s not interested in acquiring TikTok
item.description: Elon Musk recently said he is “not chomping at the bit to acquire TikTok.” Musk made those remarks during an interview at the WELT Economic Summit on ...

item.title: Trump ends legal battle over Twitter ban

item.title: Apple’s new research robot takes a page from Pixar’s playbook

item.title: Eufy E20 3-in-1 Robot Vacuum Review: Compact Convenience
item.description: This innovative cleaning solution includes a robot vacuum, a cordless stick vacuum, and a handheld vacuum in one.

item.title: Fancii Abigail Review: The Best Travel Makeup Mirror
item.description: If you do your makeup on the go, this portable lighted makeup mirror makes a fantastic base station.

item.title: Hilleberg Akto Review: The Best Solo Tent
item.description: Headed into the backcountry alone? The Atko is the best tent I've ever used.
